remarks: Univariate polynomial evaluation for subrings maps the exponentiation of a variable to the exponentiation of the evaluated variable. (Contributed by AV, 14-Sep-2019.)
statement:
evls1varpw.q $e |- Q = ( S evalSub1 R ) $.
evls1varpw.u $e |- U = ( S |`s R ) $.

evls1varpw.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
evls1varpw.e $e |- .^ = ( .g ` G ) $.
evls1varpw.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. CRing ) $.
evls1varpw.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) $.
evls1varpw.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
evls1varpw $p |- ( ph -> ( Q ` ( N .^ X ) ) = ( N ( .g ` ( mulGrp ` ( S ^s B ) ) ) ( Q ` X ) ) ) $.
